item.title: Pluralistic Image Completion
item.description: Pluralistic Online Demo Demo is not available on mobile devices. Apologize. if (/Android|webOS|iPhone|iPad|iPod|BlackBerry|BB|PlayBook|IEMobile|Windows Phone|Kindle|Silk|Opera Mini/i.test(navigator.userAgent)) { console.log("detect mobile device."); document.getElementById('celebahq').style.display = "none"; document.getElementById('mobile').style.display = "block"; } Notes: The Pluralistic model provides multiple and diverse plausible results by clicking the Fill button. For large holes, we can click the Mask Type to select the Rectangle holes. For free-form line, the left slider can be used to set the line width [1,50].
